summary: Feature request to ensure built-in query responses in the Ruby SDK use "RawValue" format, aligning with the cross-SDK features specification.
userImpact: Users relying on built-in query responses will get consistent RawValue formatting across all Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement RawValue format for built-in query responses as specified in temporalio/features#604
resolutionDetails: Issue closed after implementation of RawValue format for built-in queries
keyQuote: Make sure built-in queries return a raw value
